amendment.description: Amendment allows mining projects that have already applied for a permit and are currently in the permitting process to have access to the new expedited procedures outlined in the bill.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 5 printed in House Report 112-590 to allow projects that have already applied for a permit access to the new expedited process under the bill.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Cravaack amendment (A005) Agreed to by voice vote.
